channel.title: Whonix Workstation problem
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
First of all I would like to say that I'm new to whonix. After the installation of whonix 14.0.0.1.1 I've encountered a problem. On a whonix-gateway I have all the applications, but when I start whonix-workstation it loads as an empty OS. There are no terminal or any other program, I can only see places like home, network, root and trash.

item.title: Whonix Workstation problem
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Minute_Riddles:

After the installation of whonix 14.0.0.1.1

Did not see that before. Clear now. You are not supposed to use that version. Developers only.

Please use a stable version, please go through https://www.whonix.org/download/.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix Workstation problem
item.dc:creator: Agent47
item.description:
I’m having a similar problem. I downloaded the windows simple installer and the gateway is working fine but the workstation is just a gui user login screen, wouldn’t let me login with the user/pass from the gateway either. Would you recommend that I just install it the traditional way with the two images of the workstation and gateway?

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix Workstation problem
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Did you download it from whonix.org/download? Don’t download from
download.whonix.org, there are developers-only versions that may be
broken like this.

Read full topic
